title: Kenya
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 1,255 words, Level U (Grade 4), Lexile 930L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     L and Y
description: Kenya is famous for its wildlife, but the country has many other things to learn about. From the country's diverse people to its rich history, Kenya will teach students all about this beautiful country. Detailed maps support the text.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
